SEARCH
Package CommandLineTypingTest.Providers

Class NonsenseSentenceProvider

java.lang.Object
CommandLineTypingTest.Providers.NonsenseSentenceProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
TextToTypeProvider
public class NonsenseSentenceProvider extends Object implements TextToTypeProvider
Provides sentences composed of nonsense words for the typing test. Nonsense words are words that are not in the dictionary, making them more challenging to type.

  • Field Summary

      public NonsenseSentenceProvider()
      Constructs a new NonsenseSentenceProvider. This constructor reads nonsense words from a file and stores them in a list.
